Draft Beer

  • coming soon

    Belgian Style Golden Ale

    A golden ale with floral hop character

    OG 12° | ABV 5.2% | IBUs 26 | SRM 3.7

    A highly attenuated, well carbonated ale with floral hop notes and a spicy yeast character. Our interpretation of the style brings continental hops to the forefront while maintaining a balance between hops, yeast, and malt.

  • coming soon

    Elst IPA

    A strong West Coast IPA with a blend of hops

    OG 13.5L | ABV 5.8% | IBU 73 | SRM 7

    A hoppy and bitter, moderately strong American ale, with a mixture of American Centennial, Citra, Chinook hops. The balance is hopforward, with a clean fermentation profile, dryish finish, and clean, supporting malt allowing the citrus hop character to shine through.

  • coming soon

    Citra Session IPA

    A light session ale packed with Citra hops

    ABV 4.5% SRM 5 IBU 57 OG 1.045

    An American style session IPA brewed with 100% Citra hops giving this beer a moderate bitterness with strong tropical fruit flavor and aroma.

  • coming soon

    Rye Stout

    An American Stout made with Rye

    stuff

    This stout finishes dry with notes of chocolate, spicy rye, and roasted malts.

Bottle Conditioned Beer

  • coming soon

    Belgian Dubbel Ale

    A malty beer with spicy esters

    OG 15L | 6.7% abv | IBUs 17.6 | SRMs 28.5

    A moderately strong abbey ale with a malty backbone and spicy yeast esters. This beer gets it's unique malty character from Belgian Candi Sugar and our house Belgian strain of yeast.
